name: Verify Fetch Environment Details API when environment is not found (Negative Case) -- @1.2

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch environment details with an invalid or missing env_id "None"
Then the status code should be 400 for not found error
And the response should contain an error message

fullName: Fetch Environment Details API: Verify Fetch Environment Details API when environment is not found (Negative Case)
